meta: In Lopit, when a word-initial e comes before an o or a u, the e in instead pronounced as an o.
train: Lohidong spears the paper with the pen.
The big man digs in the field.
eibongo haidoloni ho haromoni de lecari
The singer meets with the field hand at the danceball.
efer hingohu de halu na haji
The dog lies at the back of the house.
The field hands rest on the mat.
The children play with the dog.
test: oboro haboroni ho eibiri de ho hoit
The big men dance with the shovel in the kitchen.
oboro habarani ho haborit de ho herong
The cattle owners draw in the playground.
